summary_back: Disciplined and adaptable software developer with a strong ability to multitask and maintain a positive outlook. Proactive, efficient and focused on achieving high-quality results. Enjoys collaboration, thrives in dynamic environments, and is committed to continuous learning.
experience: Always learning and growing in my field!
experience_back:
Experience

eDynamix (2024–Present) – Junior Database Developer, Stara Zagora, Bulgaria

  • As a Junior Database Developer, I have been responsible for designing, optimizing, and maintaining relational databases to support business operations and reporting. My role involves writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to manage and manipulate large datasets efficiently. I have worked on database performance tuning, ensuring data integrity, and automating workflows using T-SQL scripts and SSIS packages. • Created and maintained database schemas, tables, indexes, and relationships to ensure data consistency.
  • Automated data processing workflows using T-SQL scripts and triggers.
  • Created and maintained reports and dashboards using SSRS. • Designed and optimized T-SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to improve database performance.
